snippet.title: Stilt - Official Lobby Interactions and Assist Mode Update Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Stilt is a VR parkour platformer developed by Rekt Games. Players will soon gain access to the Lobby Interactions and Assist Mode update bringing different abilities to do within a lobby alongside Assist Mode that can add platforms and prevent permadeath for players that need aid. The Lobby Interactions and Assist Mode update launches on July 11 for PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), Steam VR, and Meta Quest.
